content.text:
# 2008 Orange Warsaw Open – Singles

Nikolay Davydenko
| runner   =  Tommy Robredo
| score    = 6–3, 6–3
| draw     = 32 (4 / 3)
| seeds    = 8
| before_name = Orange Prokom Open
| after_year = no
| type     = singles doubles
}}
Second-seeded Tommy Robredo was the defending champion, but first-seeded Nikolay Davydenko defeated him 6–3, 6–3, in the final.
Seeds
Nikolay Davydenko (champion)
#  Tommy Robredo (final)
#  Juan Mónaco (semifinals)
#  Gilles Simon (first round)
#  Guillermo Cañas (quarterfinals)
#  Potito Starace (second round, retired due to a headache)
#  Marcel Granollers (quarterfinals)
#  Albert Montañés (second round)
}}
